![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20100%20100'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
](https://www.realsimple.com/health/nutrition-diet/healthy-
eating/the-30-healthiest-foods)

####  [ The 30 Healthiest Foods to Eat Every Day
](https://www.realsimple.com/health/nutrition-diet/healthy-
eating/the-30-healthiest-foods)

All too often, seemingly healthy snacks are secretly loaded with sugar,
saturated fats, and carbohydrates. That's why we handpicked the most healthy
foods that are delicious and incredibly easy to cook with. After all, rule
number one for sticking to a smart meal plan is to not get bored, and these
healthy ingredients will keep you on your toes (promise!). You'll notice
something that all these healthy foods to eat have in common: each one is a
basic ingredient, such as a grain, fruit, vegetable, or dairy product. Read:
no pre-packaged products with a laundry list of strange-sounding ingredients
in sight. You can use this as a rule of thumb when shopping: if the food is
simple, wholesome, plant-based, and/or comes from the periphery of the grocery
store—i.e., where the produce, eggs, fish, and other whole foods tend to
live—you're in good shape. (Literally.) Now, on to the healthy food list.
RELATED: 40 Healthy Snacks to Help You Bid Farewell to Hanger for Good

# The 9 Best Bluetooth Headphones With Amazing Sound Quality, According to
Tech Lovers

Whether you prefer listening to a podcast or jamming out to music, these top-
rated headphones offer the best sound quality.

By [Rebecca Carhart](/author/rebecca-carhart)

February 06, 2019

Each product we feature has been independently selected and reviewed by our
editorial team. If you make a purchase using the links included, we may earn
commission.

Investing in a pair of Bluetooth headphones is a total game changer. Not only
will you no longer have to deal with tangled cords, but they also provide more
mobility than traditional wired headphones.

While in the past you may have had to sacrifice sound quality when you [used
wireless options](https://www.realsimple.com/work-life/technology/best-
wireless-headphones), the Bluetooth headphones in stores now offer just as
good of quality (if not better) than their wired counterparts. Plus, the
latest models even come with high-tech upgrades like long battery life, water
resistance, and noise-canceling capabilities.

With so many Bluetooth headphones in stores, finding the right one to fit your
listening needs can feel overwhelming. So who better to turn to for advice
than shoppers who have already purchased and tested these products out for
themselves? To help you cut through the clutter, we rounded up the nine best
Bluetooth headphones that have both near-perfect ratings and thousands of
glowing customer reviews.

Whether you are looking for over-the-ear Bluetooth headphones or Bluetooth
earbuds, keep reading to see which options customers love the most.

##

1

Cowin E7 Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones

These over-the-ear Bluetooth headphones by Cowin are a [number-one best seller
on
Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/gp/bestsellers/electronics/12097479011/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&linkCode=ll2&tag=rsbluetoothheadphonesrcarhartfeb19-20&linkId=a45b727aea61fe655209ec8a2b7c5b56&language=en_US)
thanks to its noise canceling abilities, as well as the fact that they are one
of the most comfortable options around. The lightweight headset stays charged
for up to thirty hours of playtime and comes in five stylish colors. Many
satisfied customers said they are “great headphones at a great price.”

**To buy:** $60; [amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Cancelling-Headphones-
Bluetooth-Comfortable-
Cellphone/dp/B019U00D7K/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&linkCode=ll1&tag=rsbluetoothheadphonesrcarhartfeb19-20&linkId=ab96a2c51675daa3354b90aecf520af3&language=en_US).

bluetooth-headphones.jpg)

##

2

Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Headphones

This sleek option by Bose uses the latest Bluetooth technology for easy
connectivity and seamless audio syncing. Its lithium-ion battery lasts up to
fifteen hours on each charge, and the lightweight headphones are specially
designed to seamlessly switch between two connected Bluetooth devices at a
time. One happy customer said he was “beyond impressed” before adding, “I
bought these as a gift for my wife. She absolutely loves them. The sound
quality is exquisite. I have heard notes in both the music and the artists
voice that I haven't heard before. Best headset I have ever experienced.”

**To buy:** $229; [amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Bose-SoundLink-around-
ear-wireless-
headphones/dp/B0117RGG8E/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&linkCode=ll1&tag=rsbluetoothheadphonesrcarhartfeb19-20&linkId=de952df21767b4368b04a46d85498dd8&language=en_US).

##

3

Senso Activbuds S-250 Bluetooth Headphones

With a four-star rating and over 29,900 reviews on Amazon, Senso’s earbuds are
one of the most popular Bluetooth headphones around—and it’s easy to see why!
The stylish top-rated wireless headphones offer high-definition sound quality
and up to eight hours of battery life. They are also one of the best Bluetooth
headphones for running because they allow for more mobility, are sweatproof,
and offer a comfortable secure fit, so the headphones won’t fall off while you
pound the pavement.

**To buy:** $23; [amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Bluetooth-Headphones-
Waterproof-Sweatproof-
Cancelling/dp/B01G8JO5F2/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&linkCode=ll1&tag=rsbluetoothheadphonesrcarhartfeb19-20&linkId=7f023cba9c8a5eb039647de6a9131f8d&language=en_US).

##

4

Beats By Dre Solo3 On-Ear Headphones

Beats by Dre has been one of the leading Bluetooth headphone brands for years,
thanks to its award-winning sound quality and sleek comfortable design. This
highly-rated option by the brand offers up to forty hours of listening time
and multifunction on-ear controls. One five-star review said, “Been on the
market for a while for a good set of Bluetooth headphones and these are by far
the best set I've come across that are wireless and reasonably priced with
excellent volume, bass and treble, and ease of use! With this type of product,
you really get what you pay for! I'm very picky about my music sources and
sound quality and these instantly impressed me right out of the box!”

**To buy:** $240 (was $300); [amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Beats-
Solo3-Wireless-Ear-
Headphones/dp/B07HKHWX7X/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&linkCode=ll1&tag=rsbluetoothheadphonesrcarhartfeb19-20&linkId=03421dc3638a5dc3b409a6ba4cd43f83&language=en_US).

##

5

Mpow 059 Over The Ear Bluetooth Headphones

Over 19,400 Amazon customers agree this option by Mpow is one of the best
Bluetooth headphones for under $100. The over-the-ear silhouette is made with
memory-protein ear cushions to ensure lasting comfort, while the stainless
steel slider and padded headband allow you to find the perfect fit. The
battery lasts up to twenty hours, and the stylish headphones can even fold up,
making them easy to pack for trips or daily commutes.

**To buy:** $35; [amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Mpow-Bluetooth-
Headphones-Wireless-Memory-
Protein/dp/B01NAJGGA2/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&linkCode=ll1&tag=rsbluetoothheadphonesrcarhartfeb19-20&linkId=12fc5a31f85fff2c49583b3842b14b36&language=en_US).

##

6

TrebLab XR100 Bluetooth Sport Headphones

If you are looking to buy the best sport Bluetooth headphones, Walmart
customers suggest this sleek pair by TrebLab. The affordable Bluetooth earbuds
offer true stereo HD sound with unparalleled bass and treble response. They
are also water resistant, sweatproof, and compatible with all Bluetooth
devices. One happy customer wrote, “I like that they fit well and they are
loud. Awesome for working out or cleaning the house and you can't beat the
price they were so reasonable.”

**To buy:** $24;
[walmart.com](http://goto.walmart.com/c/249354/565706/9383?subId1=RS%2CThe9BestBluetoothHeadphonesWithAmazingSoundQuality%252CAccordingtoTechLovers%2Cmgandara%2CTEC%2CIMA%2C646268%2C201902%2CI&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FTREBLAB-

##

7

Apple AirPods

If you are an iPhone user and have been thinking about getting AirPods, Apple
customers suggest giving them a try. While the Bluetooth earbuds will connect
to non-Apple devices as well, if you want to get the most out of the pricey
earbuds you should use them with an iPhone, Macbook, or Apple Watch. Once
connected to an Apple device, you can double tap the AirPod to connect you to
Siri, allowing you to ask it questions, make calls, and control playlists and
the volume.

One customer raved, “They were very easy to pair and they connect seamlessly
almost instantly when you put them in your ears. They have great battery life
and charge super fast and don't fall out of your ears easily. I think they are
worth every penny!”

**To buy:** $159;
[apple.com](https://apple.sjv.io/c/249354/435031/7613?subId1=RS%2CThe9BestBluetoothHeadphonesWithAmazingSoundQuality%252CAccordingtoTechLovers%2Cmgandara%2CTEC%2CIMA%2C646268%2C201902%2CI&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMMEF2AM%2FA%2Fairpods).

##

8

TaoTronics TT-BH07 Bluetooth Earbuds

These TaoTronics earbuds earned themselves an elusive Amazon’s Choice rating
because customers say they are one of the best in-ear Bluetooth headphones
around. The earbuds fit snugly and stay secure no matter how much you are
moving. They also feature built-in magnets, so you can attach the two
headphones when you aren’t using them and wear them as a necklace to avoid
losing them. Many of the five-star reviewers called them, “the best headphones
I’ve ever owned.”

**To buy:** $26; [amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Bluetooth-Headphones-
TaoTronics-TT-

##

9

Sony Extra Bass Bluetooth Headphones

These stylish Bluetooth headphones by Sony feature a bass boost button that
produces club-like enhanced low frequencies and a built-in microphone for
hands-free phone calling. They also offer up to twenty hours of battery life.
Customers love how comfortable the ear cushions are and the high-quality sound
levels the headphones produce.

**To buy:** $170;
[amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00MCHE38O/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&linkCode=ll1&tag=rsbluetoothheadphonesrcarhartfeb19-20&linkId=aaf0eef3ee64e32e1cffaecc89bedb01&language=en_US).
